name: Bounce Battle (FawnTune)
description:
*1/7/2020 Fixed WebGL Size

This is my first ever game (I'm mainly an artist)! I made it from scratch, chipping away at it for around four months, and it's finally done. I made all the assets, including art and music, and programmed the entire game by myself. I'm pretty proud of the end product. :)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All the tools and resources I used were free: 

  • The game is made in unity
  • I drew all the sprites and art on piskel.app
  • I used bfxr.net for the sound effects and beepbox.co for the music (never wrote a song before so hopefully the music is tolerable LOL).
  • Free tutorials: 
    • [Youtubers - gamedev] Brackeys (rip Brackeys), Blackthornprod, Alvin Roe
    • [Youtubers - pixelart] AdamCYounis, MortMort
    • [Unity] Unity Learn
    • [Better Platformer Tutorial]  5 Tips, 5 Reasons

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Inspired by Mario and the flash game (rip flash) "The Fight for Glorton."
